column1: instrumental_laws,"$total_paths : {description := the value of a node is the sum of values of all the paths going through the node},
$path_multiplication : {description := the value of a node equals the multiplication of the edges leading to it},
$total_arrows_1 : {description := the values of arrows coming out of a node add up to 1},
$equivalent_paths : {description := paths with the same set of nodes in different trees have same value}"
